title: i cant ban in draft
body: i click a champion when im banning and nothing happens, so i end up dodging every draft game because i cant ban. Anyone know what i can do

replies.body: It sounds like you're losing sync in champion select, which can be caused by network issues.  Cases like this can result in disconnections or delays, but we've got a solid [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this up.  Go over each step to resolve this for good, and you'll be set!  Let me know if you have questions!
